word:
Honor the Lovely Jesus.--One cannot row another's boat. We must strive for heaven with all our might. Everyone has a part to act and something to 


                                     -99- 

do in the cause of God. None of you should keep silent in your meetings. Surely everyone who has tasted of the powers of the world to come can say something in honor of the lovely Jesus.--Letter 30, 1850, p. 2. (To Brother and Sister Loveland, December 13, 1850.)
